name: CUST_SERV_TEXT
description: This table extracts the communication text for a given Customer Service (NCS) record.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the customer service communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: TEXT_CUST_SERV
columns.description: Documentation for the customer service communication.
